verbose_text: In PCV, greater than 90% of patients have the acquired janus kinase 2 (JAK2) V617F mutation 8, 9, causing activation of the intrinsic JAK / STAT (signal transducers and activators of transcription) pathway 8, 9.
evidence: janus kinase 2 (JAK2) V617F mutation 8, 9, causing activation of the intrinsic JAK/STAT
